name: F_LevelDesign
description:
A level made in UE5, as part of a formative assignment for a Game Design Certificate program. The level design documentation will  be uploaded soon.  The "game" is a  first person perspective one, I used the ALS template as a code base. Current mechanics are just  basic movement and some climbing/mantling.
This is just a blockout. 

Controls

Movement     -> WASD
Jump/Climb  -> Space
Crouch             -> Left Ctrl


Update: Added  settings menu and minor bug fixing .
